text: James Paul Wheeler (born 5 February 1947)Paul Wheeler rugby profile ESPN Scrum.com was a Welsh international full back who played club rugby for Aberavon. He won two caps for Wales including one against the 1967 touring New Zealand side. ==International matches played== WalesSmith (1980), pg 464. * 1968 * 1967 == Bibliography == * == References == Category:Rugby union players from Newport, Wales Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Rugby union fullbacks Category:1947 births Category:Swansea RFC players Category:Living people Category:Aberavon RFC players
title: Paul James Wheeler
